Text.Page: You were ordered to redeploy to the Tainted Gorge to go on the offensive. En route, you came across a crashed courier named Chione, who asked you to deliver some orders for her. You delivered the orders to Riel and prepared for the next stage.

I think Elleon may have gone on to explore the Tainted Gorge. If he's not there, we could probably still find a clue as to what he's looking for.

Get further instructions from Adria.

Okay, I want you to head over to the Tainted Gorge. There'll be some kind of clue out there, I'm sure.

Redeploying some of our troops to the Tainted Gorge is probably a good idea, anyway. We keep trying to pull out, but somehow the threat out there never dies down.

Talk to Bipi first, though. She needs some help.

That flighty silly girl!

I do need help, thank you. Chione's airship crashed en route to the Tainted Gorge. She was carrying vital supplies and Leander's report, but she couldn't fight her way out of a pillow fort.

Head east from the Tower Base and link up with her.

Time is of the essence.

The report? Oh yes, it's safe and sealed!

Edan's supposed to read it. I've got a bit of a mess here though, so I can't take it onward.

Perhaps you could!

Leander's report, eh? Let's take a look....

Demons, as we suspectedâ€”though we didn't dream they'd be this powerful. The Tainted Gorge is crawling with our enemies, but they're not fighting us. They're looking for something.

Whatever it is, we'd best get to it before they do!
